Overview
Overview / Product overview / Features / Extended features
Extended features
RICOH ProcessDirector extended features are custom software components that you can purchase from your Ricoh support representative. The
Ricoh support representative installs the extended features on the existing RICOH ProcessDirector primary computer.
Parent topic: Features
